name: VikingsFan
0:
”Alexa, open Vikings fan.”
”Alexa, ask Vikings fan for a flash briefing on the Vikings.”
”Alexa, ask Vikings fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vikings fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Vikings by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Vikings.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Vikings Fan how are the Vikings doing? 

Alexa, ask Vikings Fan who do the Vikings play next?

Alexa, ask Vikings Fan Harrison Smith (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Vikings:


Alexa, ask Vikings Fan to tell me some trivia about the Vikings. 

Alexa, ask Vikings Fan how many Super Bowls have the Vikings won?
